Name: Academic Program
Description: Add program pages for majors and minors.
Settings/notes: Need teaser (for program finder & department programs) and thumbnail view modes (for related programs) - thumbnail view renders 393x221 image style

Name: Announcement
Description: Add a sitewide or section announcement
Settings/notes: Node not shown to anonymous users (use a Twig page template (see support book template). Site admins can add/edit/delete only. Set metatags for no index/nofollow, etc

Name: College
Description: Use to add college pages.
Settings/notes: Allow in main menu

Name: Contact Library
Description: Add contact information for department and general pages.
Settings/notes: Set a metatag for noindex, nofollow, etc. Add page template to restrict access to logged in users. Market editors and site admins only

Name: Department
Description: Use to add department pages.
Settings/notes: Allow in department menu

Name: Event
Description: Create an upcoming event.
Settings/notes: Allows promotion

Name: Fact Library
Description: Add facts to be used around the site.
Settings/notes: Set a metatag for noindex, nofollow, etc. Add page template to restrict access to logged in users. Market editors and site admins only

Name: General Pages
Description: Use general pages for text heavy lower-level pages that can be reached through the sidebar menu.
Settings/notes: Set a metatag for the home page to use a custom title and not the node title for the page title.

Name: Hours Library
Description: Add hours for department and general pages.
Settings/notes: Set a metatag for noindex, nofollow, etc. Add page template to restrict access to logged in users. Market editors and site admins only

Name: Job
Description: Add job posting information.
Settings/notes: Need hard coded links for application and benefit estimator on the front-end of the node theme. NOTE: May not do thisâ€”hold until very end.

Name: Landing Page
Description: Use for the home page and highly designed upper-level pages.

Name: Profile
Description: Add profile information for a person.
Settings/notes: Username field becomes the node title using autoentity label, title field hidden.

Name: Snapshot Library
Description: Add snapshot content for placement around the site.
Settings/notes: Set a metatag for noindex, nofollow, etc. Add page template to restrict access to logged in users. Market editors and site admins only

Description: Add time sensitive story content.
Settings/notes: Potentially scheduled (need confirmation). Add teaser view mode that shows story image, intro text, link to story. Allows promotion

Name: Testimonial Library
Description: Add testimonials for placement around the site.

Description: Add images as media entities.

Description: Embed remote video from YouTube or Vimeo.

Description: A basic block contains a title and a body.

Settings/notes: If the author has a profile assigned then the authors name is linked to the profile wherever it appears. Only site admins can access.

Description: Campuses for programs, departments, etc.

Name: Program Types

Name: Section Styles
Description: Sets styles for paragraph sections.

Description: Used differentiate types of snapshots.

Name: News Categories
Description: Categories for stories.

Name: Story Types
Description: Define the intent of story nodes.

Name: Accordion Item
Description: Adds WYSIWYG content inside accordions.

Name: Accordions
Description: Creates structure for accordion items.

Name: Additional Links

Description: Add bio data to the fauxfile list.

Name: Fauxfile
Description: Add a list of manually entered bio data.

Description: Create a lightbox or slide show photo gallery.

Name: Hallmark

Description: Add hours on a page.

Description: Add a set hours to an hours library.

Name: Image
Description: Creates a linkable image in various sizes.

Name: Layout Section
Description: Add a customizable section of widgets to a page.
Settings/notes: Only site admins can create, all can edit or remove.

Name: Limited Section
Description: Single column layout with no additional fields.

Name: Map
Description: Add a google map of a single location.
Settings/notes: Use Adam's Google API Key until we get theirs

Name: Portal
Description: Add a portal link with limited information to another page or external URL.

Name: Portals
Description: Add a group of portals.

Name: Profiles List
Description: Add list of bios for a specific department, program or tag or create a list manually.

Description: Add a program search block to page content.

Name: Quote
Description: Displays text with stylized quotation marks.
Settings/notes: Shown on story mockup

Name: Select Item
Description: Add a stylized list of selectable option links.
Settings/notes: Only site admins can create, all can delete and edit.

Name: Select Type
Description: Add a select item to the select type widget.
Settings/notes: Only site admins can create, all can delete and edit. Selects sized based on number used. Always fit to one line.

Name: Slate Form
Description: Add a slate form to a page.
Settings/notes: Likely can just be a checkbox on the program CT

Name: Snapshot List
Description: Add a list of snapshot items by tag or choose specific ones.

Name: Social Media Links
Description: Add links to social media platforms.

Name: Steps
Description: Add stylized stepped content.

Name: Step Item
Description: Add a step to steps.
Settings/notes: Individual steps sized based on number used. Always fit on one row.

Name: Stories & Video List
Description: Add a video with a list of stories.

Name: Testimonial Placer
Description: Add list of testimonials for tag or create a list manually.
Settings/notes: Only site admins can use

Name: Text
Description: Allows WYSIWYG text

Name: Video
Description: Display a responsive Youtube or Vimeo video from the web or media library.

Name: Video Card List
Description: Add a list of video cards to a page.

Name: View Placer
Description: Place main views around the site
Settings/notes: Only site admins can use. The selected view will embed the 'main' display for the view (via twig). "Main' denotes any embed display not used in placer/list paragraphs or the content carousel. If there are multiple displays for a view that need to be placed using this widget, we'll need to add a display field.

Name: Wayfinding
Description: Add wayfinding navigational content.
Settings/notes: Only site admins can create, all can delete and edit.
